name: Human
traitDescription: +1 to all skills and Initiative.

name: Elf
traitDescription: Advantage on Initiative, +1 Speed. Know Elvish if INT is not negative.

name: Dwarf
traitDescription: +2 max Hit Dice, +1 max Wounds, -1 Speed. Know Dwarvish if INT is not negative.

name: Halfling
traitDescription: +1 to Stealth. If you fail a save, succeed instead, 1/Safe Rest.

name: Gnome
traitDescription: Allow an ally within Reach 6 to reroll any single die, resets when healed to max HP. -1 Speed. Know Dwarvish if INT is not negative (call it Gnomish).

name: Bunbun
traitDescription: Before Interposing or after Defending (after damage), hop up to your Speed in any direction for free, 1/encounter.

name: Dragonborn
traitDescription: +1 Armor. When you attack: deal additional LVL+KEY damage (ignoring armor) divided as you choose among any targets; recharges at Safe Rest or gaining a Wound. Know Draconic if INT is not negative.

name: Fiendkin
traitDescription: 1 of your neutral saves is advantaged instead. Know Infernal if INT is not negative.

name: Goblin
traitDescription: Can move 2 spaces for free after becoming target of attack or negative effect (after damage, ignoring difficult terrain). Know Goblin if INT is not negative.

name: Kobold
traitDescription: Force an enemy to reroll non-critical attack against you, 1/encounter. +3 to Influence friendly characters. Advantage on skill checks related to dragons. Know Draconic if INT is not negative.

name: Orc
traitDescription: When you would drop to 0 HP, set your HP to LVL instead, 1/Safe Rest. +1 Might. Know Goblin if INT is not negative (call it Orcish).

name: Birdfolk
traitDescription: Have fly Speed as long as wearing armor no heavier than Leather. Crits against you are Vicious (attacker rolls 1 additional die). Forced movement moves you twice as far.

name: Celestial
traitDescription: Your disadvantaged save is Neutral instead. Know Celestial if INT is not negative.

name: Changeling
traitDescription: +2 shifting skill points. May take on appearance of any ancestry. When you do, place 2 shifting skill points into any 1 skill. 1/day.

name: Crystalborn
traitDescription: When you Defend, gain KEY armor and deal KEY damage back to attacker. 1/encounter.

name: Dryad/Shroomling
traitDescription: Whenever an enemy causes you one or more Wounds, excrete soporific spores: all adjacent enemies are Dazed. Know Elvish if INT is not negative.

name: Half-Giant
traitDescription: Force an enemy to reroll crit against you, 1/encounter. +2 Might. Know Dwarvish if INT is not negative.

name: Minotaur/Beastfolk
traitDescription: When you move at least 4 spaces, push a creature in your path. Medium: 1 space; Small/Tiny: up to 2 spaces. 1/turn.

name: Oozeling/Construct
traitDescription: Increment Hit Dice one step (d6>d8>d10>d12>d20); always heal for maximum. Magical healing heals for minimum amount.

name: Planarbeing
traitDescription: Whenever you Defend, gain 1 Wound to temporarily phase out of material plane and ignore damage. -2 max Wounds.

name: Ratfolk
traitDescription: Gain +2 armor if you moved on your last turn.

name: Stoatling
traitDescription: Whenever you make single-target attack against creature larger than you, roll 1 additional d6 for each size category larger. They do same.

name: Turtlefolk
traitDescription: +4 Armor, -2 Speed.

name: Wyrdling
traitDescription: Whenever you or willing ally within Reach 6 casts a tiered spell, allow them to roll on the Chaos Table. 1/encounter.
